attributes.action: Stop the ridiculous amounts of money footballers get
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is ridiculous the amount of money footballers get, they get thousands and thousands of pounds for about 2 hours work, and there are millions of people starving wordwide and dying off disease , and if footballers were made to work for less then that money could be used to fix the world and help people to eat and to medication which is a basic human right.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
